timeline.bodyText:
Can you add flags:
    --platform managed \
    --allow-unauthenticated \
   --region [REGION]

For step 3, we prefer using --update-env-vars and if you want more clarity you can use the flag multiple times like:
--update-env-vars CLOUD_SQL_CONNECTION_NAME=[INSTANCE_CONNECTION_NAME] \
--update-env-vars DB_USER=[MY_DB_USER],DB_PASS=[MY_DB_PASS],DB_NAME=[MY_DB]
